description: This file contains unit tests for the TypeScript project template system, including fixtures for setting up temporary directories, mock templates, and project configurations. It tests template initialization, project structure creation, post-processing scripts execution, configuration loading, and template variable replacement.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Represents the configuration of a project, including name, version, description, author, project type, output path, and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration of supported project types, e.g., TYPESSCRIPT.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Contains initial setup information for a project template, such as commands and environment details.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Fixture that creates and cleans up a temporary directory for testing.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture that sets up a mock template directory with configuration and source files.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture that creates a sample project configuration object for testing.

methods.name: test_typescript_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests that template initialization info is correctly retrieved and contains expected commands.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies project files are created with correct content and structure after initialization.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks that the post-processing script runs successfully and performs its intended action.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures project configuration can be loaded correctly from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Validates that template variables in source files are correctly replaced during project initialization.
